mainMenu.title: Login
mainMenu.description: If you want to subscribe to a plan or have already subscribed you can login here. Also if you are a registered provider you can login here.

mainMenu.title: Become A Provider
mainMenu.description: You can Become a provider in SubsCrypt platform by connecting a PolkaDot.js wallet and filling a simple form. You are required to stake a minimum amount of token.

mainMenu.title: Get Test Token
mainMenu.description: SubsCrypt is a blockchain based project so you need tokens to interact with our platform, you can get 10 free tokens here.

login.title: Choose Network
login.description: The only supported chain is PolkaDot.

login.title: Subscriber Role
login.description: Choose this if you are a subscriber or you want to be a subscriber.

login.title: Provider Role
login.description: Choose this if you are a provider in SubsCrypt platform.

login.title: Connect to Wallet
login.description: If you are a new subscriber and you don't have any credentials and have a connected PolkaDot.js wallet on your browser choose this for easy login method.

login.title: Credential login
login.description: Choose this if you don't have access to your wallet and login with your username and password.

login.title: Choose your Wallet
login.description: Choose your preferred account between your connected wallet addresses.

providerDashboard.title: Withdraw
providerDashboard.description: You can withdraw your tokens by simply requesting a withdraw. The tokens will be transferred to your Money Address.

providerDashboard.title: Add a Plan
providerDashboard.description: You can add a new custom plan here.

providerDashboard.title: View and Edit Plan
providerDashboard.description: You can view and edit detail of your plan.

providerDashboard.title: Change your password
providerDashboard.description: You can change your password if you have access to your PolkaDot.js wallet.

providerDashboard.title: Logout
providerDashboard.description: Click to log out of your account.

subscriberNewOffer.title: Choose your provider
subscriberNewOffer.description: You can enter a provider address or username here or use the default one.

subscriberNewOffer.title: Change your password
subscriberNewOffer.description: You can change your password if you have access to your PolkaDot.js wallet.

subscriberNewOffer.title: Logout
subscriberNewOffer.description: Click to log out of your account.

subscriberWithPlan.title: See your subscribed plan
subscriberWithPlan.description: You can check details of your subscribed plans.

subscriberWithPlan.title: Renew your plan
subscriberWithPlan.description: You can easily renew your plan if you have a connected wallet.

subscriberWithPlan.title: Change your password
subscriberWithPlan.description: You can easily refund your plan if you have a connected wallet. The refundable amount will be transferred to your wallet.

subscriberWithPlan.title: Marketplace
subscriberWithPlan.description: Click to log out of your account.

becomeProvider.title: Get Test Token
becomeProvider.description: SubsCrypt is a blockchain based project so you need tokens to interact with our platform, you can get 10 free tokens here. You can check your balance in up menu.

becomeProvider.title: Enter your name
becomeProvider.description: You will be shown you subscriber with this name.

becomeProvider.title: Enter your description
becomeProvider.description: This is a short description of you and your services.

becomeProvider.title: Enter your Username
becomeProvider.description: This is your username for login with credentials, please be aware that you can not change your username in future.

becomeProvider.title: Enter your Password
becomeProvider.description: This is your password for login with credentials, You can change your password in future.

becomeProvider.title: Enter your Address
becomeProvider.description: This address will be used to send you your earnings.

becomeProvider.title: Upload your profile
becomeProvider.description: Please upload a profile picture for your account. This picture will be shown to users.

becomeProvider.title: Create your custom plan
becomeProvider.description: Please fill details of your custom plan, You can change the details in future.

becomeProvider.title: Create another custom plan
becomeProvider.description: You can create more custom plans.

becomeProvider.title: Register As a provider
becomeProvider.description: Sign a transaction and lock 0.01 token in the contract to join our platform, Please be sure that your wallet has enough token otherwise use the faucet to get some.
